${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:SixInTheChamber.NAME: Six in the Chamber
${modID}:SixInTheChamber.FLAVOR: Freest wall stick combo of my life.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 6th Attack you play adds Blast to your hand.

${modID}:TalismanCasings.NAME: Talisman Casings
${modID}:TalismanCasings.FLAVOR: This jams the gun if you do this in real life.
DESCRIPTIONS: Using Blast applies 2 Cursed to the targeted enemy.
